name: Cell Protector
description:
This game was originally made for the Mini Jam 76...

The theme was RADIATION and the limitation was ONE HANDED CONTROLS.

--------------------------------------------------------

You play as a ray of radiation, killing disease cells in the body of a human... It is your job to protect the human by killing all the disease cells and keeping the healthy cells alive. The game ends when there are no healthy cells left. Do your best to keep the human alive...

--------------------------------------------------------

How to play:-

  • Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to change the direction of the player.
  • At the start of the game, you will be asked whether you want to use arrow keys or WASD... This cannot be changed later in the game.
  • Double click any of the WASD keys or arrow keys to dash. Dashing allows the player to have the ability of killing the cells for a short moment of time.
  • Disease cells can spread. When they come in contact with a healthy cell, the healthy cell turns into a disease cell and thus it spreads.
  • For selecting an option(such as play or going back to the main menu), use the ENTER or RETURN key. 
  • The mouse is totally useless in this game. Even for navigating around the menu, you have to use the arrow keys or WASD keys.
  • When there are no more healthy cells left, the game ends.

--------------------------------------------------------

Credits:-

Artwork - me

Coding - me

Game Idea - me

SFX - sfxr & me

Music - me
